title: Tasker’s upcoming Android 13 features teased w/ custom Quick Settings tiles, more
content:
Just a few short days after the launch of Android 13 Developer Preview 1 Tasker developer João Dias is teasing us with new features and functions for the automation app.

more…

The post Tasker’s upcoming Android 13 features teased w/ custom Quick Settings tiles, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Tasker developer João Dias is teasing us with new features and functions for the upcoming Android 13 build of automation app Tasker.
